well be questioned, whether the Eye, assisted with any artificiall 
help, can be made sensible therof. But 100 times the distance 
of a Starr we see, is still finite, from whence I Draw 
those that please to consider it attentively to draw the 
Conclusion.

Viz. <u>Capella, Arcturus, Lucida Lyrae and Lucida Aquilae <\u>
<sup>o<\sup> to wit <u>Palilicium, Cor Leonis, Spica and Cor Scorpii <\u>
<sup>./.<\sup> viz The <u>Foot <\u> and right <u> Sholder<\u> of <u>Orion <\u>, Sirius, Procyon & Fomalhaut
